Uses of Package
engine.input

  • Packages that use engine.input 
    Package Description
    engine.graphics  
    engine.input  
  • Classes in engine.input used by engine.graphics 
    Class and Description
    Mouse
    This singleton Mouse does not need to be constructed.
  • Classes in engine.input used by engine.input 
    Class and Description
    Function
    A KeyFunction can be added to Keyboard keys and Mouse buttons.
    Keyboard
    The singleton Keyboard manages key press events and allows you to map a KeyFunction to each Key.
    KeyCodeException
    This Exception is thrown if the Keyboard attempts to map a key code that does not match a KeyEvent VK constant or a Keyboard constant.
    Mouse
    This singleton Mouse does not need to be constructed.
